Name: 恋~一些小清新的猎奇故事~
About the game: Some Scary Love Stories is a visual novel game with option branches Players tap the screen to read the story and make their own choices, eventually leading to different ending branches Make their worlds into books, The girl sits at the desk and sips coffee invites you to read books together. To interprets the world again as her reciter? Or try to resist the fate in the book and arbitrarily modify the ending of the story? Although it is your freedom but it is at your own risk. —SisselA Kayla 'I' lost my memory and woke up in a large library, and the white-haired girl in front of me invited me to read the book for her. Every time I start reading, 'I' enters the world depicted in the book and becomes someone who is not 'I' to experiences the whole story. 'I' also has the right to be called 'reenactment' by the girl, and the action of changing the character with 'I' will lead the story to a different ending.
